languages.text: This creature gains +150% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +30% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. It also gains vampirism and can restore 150% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Это существо получает +150% к {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g}, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и +30% к шансу критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дистанционной{/g} атакой. Оно также обретает способность к вампиризму и восстанавливает 150% от нанесенного атаками {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнего боя{/g} урона в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.

It also gains vampirism and can restore 150% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

languages.original_text: This creature gains +150% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +30% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. It also gains vampirism and can restore 150% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

languages.text: この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}範囲攻撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}+150%、+6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}、クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}+30%を得る。また、ヴァンピリズムを得るとともに、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}で受けたダメージの150%を{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}として回復させることができる。
languages.original_text: This creature gains +150% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +30% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. It also gains vampirism and can restore 150% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲{/g}攻撃のダメージ150％、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}6、クリティカルヒット率30％を得る。また、ヴァンピリズムを得るとともに、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}で受けたダメージの150％を{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}として回復させることができる。

この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲攻撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}+150%、+6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}、クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}+30%を得る。また、ヴァンピリズムを得るとともに、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}で受けたダメージの150%を{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}として回復させることができる。

languages.text: 此生物造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高150%，{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}提高6点，{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程攻击{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高30%。此外，此生物获得吸血效果，每当通过{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}造成伤害时都会恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于造成伤害的150%。
languages.original_text: This creature gains +150% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +30% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. It also gains vampirism and can restore 150% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物造成的伤害提高150%，{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}提高6点，远程攻击的暴击率提高30%。{g|Encyclopedia:Range}{/g}此外，此生物获得吸血效果，每当通过{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}造成伤害时都会恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于造成伤害的150%。

此生物造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高150%，{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}提高6点，{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程{/g}攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高30%。此外，此生物获得吸血效果，每当通过{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}造成伤害时都会恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于造成伤害的150%。

languages.text: Esta criatura gana +150 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y +30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico para sus {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ataques a distancia{/g}. También gana vampirismo y recupera {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} por valor del 150 % del daño de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature gains +150% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +30% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. It also gains vampirism and can restore 150% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura gana +150 % de daño, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y +30 % de probabilidad de impacto crítico para sus ataques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g}. También gana vampirismo y recupera {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} por valor del 150 % del daño de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.

languages.text: Diese Kreatur erhält +150 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und +30 % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} für {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Fernkampfangriffe{/g}. Sie erhält außerdem Vampirismus und kann 150 % des durch {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} verursachten Schadens als {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} wiederherstellen.
languages.original_text: This creature gains +150% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +30% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. It also gains vampirism and can restore 150% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur erhält +150 % Schaden, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und +30 % kritische Trefferchance für {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}angriffe. Sie erhält außerdem Vampirismus und kann 150 % des durch {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} verursachten Schadens als {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} wiederherstellen.

languages.text: Cette créature bénéficie de +150 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et +30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de coup{/g} critique lors des {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}attaques à distance{/g}. Elle acquiert également Vampirisme et peut restaurer 150 % des dégâts infligés par les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} sous forme de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature gains +150% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +30% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. It also gains vampirism and can restore 150% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature bénéficie de +150 % de dégâts, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et +30 % de chances d'infliger un coup critique lors des attaques à {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distance{/g}. Elle acquiert également Vampirisme et peut restaurer 150 % des dégâts infligés par les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g} sous forme de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}.

languages.text: Bu yaratık; {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}menzilli saldırılarında{/g} +%150 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} ve +%30 kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g} kazanır. Ayrıca vampirlik gücü elde eder ve {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırılarıyla{/g} verdiği hasarın %150'sini {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı olarak geri kazanır.

It also gains vampirism and can restore 150% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
